mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(member_id, member_name, upper_division, lower_division, ad_account, office_phone_number) SELECT #{memberId}, #{memberName}, #{upperDivision}, #{lowerDivision}, #{adAccount}, #{officePhoneNumber} FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT M.member_id FROM member M WHERE M.member_id = #{memberId})
mapper.select: SELECT member_id, member_name, upper_division, lower_division, ad_account, office_phone_number FROM member
